dataset_id: TOVS LMD DAILY GRIDS from NOAA-12 V01 (TOVSBDND) at GES DISC
title: TOVS LMD DAILY GRIDS from NOAA-12 V01 (TOVSBDND) at GES DISC
summary: Level 3 parameters from HIRS/2 and MSU radiances using the Improved Initialization Inversion (3I) classification retrieval scheme by the Laboratoire de  Meteorologie Dynamique (Ecole Polytechnique) averaged over 1 day and mapped on to a 1x1 degree grid. This data was run as part of the NASA TOVS Pathfinder project and designated as Path-B. This dataset contains data from the NOAA-12 satellite.
